genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A collection of standardized Agent Skills to teach GitHub Copilot, Claude, Gemini and Cursor about modern Android development (Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, etc.).

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: To equip your AI agent with these skills, you must place them in a location where the agent can discover them.
